pages.text: Fishing in different $(item)water types$() can yield different chances for items:$(br)$(li) NARROW (narrow waters): fish and treasure drop rates decrease by 12.0%%$(br)$(li) PONDLET (small pond): fish and treasure drop rates decrease by 5.0%%

$(li) POND (pond): fish and treasure drop rates decrease by 1.0%%$(br)$(li) SURFACE (lowland surface): fish and treasure drop rates decrease by 0.5%%$(br)$(li) NEAR_SHORE (near shore): fish and treasure drop rates decrease by 2.0%%

$(br)$(li) OPEN_WATER (open water): fish and treasure drop rates increase by 1.0%%$(br)$(li) WELL (well): fish and treasure drop rates decrease by 2.5%%$(br)$(li) HOLE (hole): fish and treasure drop rates increase by 1.5%%
